## hsv2rgb() function

Converts hsv to rgb

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function hsv2rgb(hsv: HSV): RGB;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  hsv | <code>HSV</code> | HSV components where H is in range \[0:360\] and S and V are in range \[0:1\] |

<b>Returns:</b>

`RGB`

RGB color components in range \[0:1\]
